messages.subject: Some gatherings people might want to attend
messages.msgSnippet: Some people s understanding of unschooling blossoms after they attend a conference, camp or symposium.  I ve been asked to allow a post about ARGH through.  I
messages.messageBody:
Some people's understanding of unschooling blossoms after they attend a conference, camp or symposium. I've been asked to allow a post about ARGH through. I don't, usually, because it's an international list, but that information is below. There will not be follow-up information, so if you're near or interested in Tennessee, join the list linked below.

There will be a one-day conference in London on June 11 at which Schuyler Waynforth and I will both speak. If you're interested, watch my speaking page ( http://sandradodd.com/speaking ) for more details later about other speakers, place, time, cost, etc.

There will be three peaceful, laid-back, serious-discussion symposia in Albuquerque, in late July 2011, late December 2011, and July 2012. Early details are here: http://sandradodd.com/all

=========

Attention!! Attention!! ARGH needs you. Join us in the beautiful mountains of Tennessee Saturday, April 30th - Wednesday, May 4th. There are twelve available cabins. Prices are reasonable and the community of people is absolutely AMAZING! Please contact Laura Bowman or me for more information on attending ARGH. We'll be happy to help!!!
here's a link to the yahoo group to join for all the details and to sign up: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AutodidacticRadicalGatheringofHomeschoolers/




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
